title: The Cascade Preppers
description: What the world dreads most has happened. Now, there is only a quest for survival.Graham Morgan is back in book two of the Graham's Resolution series. In the tiny town of Cascade, Washington, the members of Graham's camp endure a severe winter season. Meanwhile, the prepper community remains dedicated to isolation and maintains their benevolent relationship. Tensions rise when tragedy strikes. The human traits of community and compassion are pitted against instincts to survive. Are their efforts doomed to coexist?
author: A.R. Shaw
